attributes.action: Protect our police officers when carrying out their duties on our behalf
attributes.additional_details: Our policing system relies on support and respect from the majority of the general public. The modern attitude of nothing to do with me and not my fault as promoted by our elected officials, will if not reversed lead to a total breakdown of real society.
attributes.background: As a father of a serving police officer who is also the father of my three grandchildren, I am demanding that serving police officers are provided with protection through meaningful minimum prison sentences.
